medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse persistent abdominal pain and an episode of lower gastrointestinal bleeding.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began several days prior to presentation in August 2011 and persisted. Initially, abdominal pain was present, with subsequent development of acute abdominal pain, tachycardia, and hypotension after 5 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of cardiac failure, pulmonary hypertension, and epistaxis of unknown cause.
medical_history.family_history: Daughter diagnosed with hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia.
